187 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
188 int16_t N775_ConvertVoltagesToTemperatures(uint16_t adcVoltage_mV) {
189  return TSI_GetTemperature(adcVoltage_mV); /* Convert degree celsius to deci degree celsius */
190 }
